meta.title: Funny Shooter
meta.description: Funny Shooter is an exciting first-person shooter where you'll battle waves of quirky enemies. Use a variety of weapons to defeat these odd adversaries and upgrade your arsenal as you advance.

hero.title: Funny Shooter
hero.subTitle: Engage in a thrilling FPS experience, fighting off waves of strange enemies! Arm yourself with diverse weapons and upgrade your arsenal as you move forward.

features.title: Key Features
features.subTitle: Designed to enhance the user experience with engaging gameplay.

items.title: Smooth gameplay with stunning 3D visuals
items.description: Enjoy a seamless gaming experience with beautifully crafted 3D environments that bring every battle to life.

items.title: Face a variety of eccentric enemies
items.description: Each level introduces new absurd enemies that challenge your skills and keep the gameplay fresh and exciting.

items.title: Purchase weapons and customize your gear
items.description: Visit the in-game shop to buy new weapons, attachments, and gear upgrades, allowing you to tailor your arsenal to your playstyle.

items.title: Unlock achievements for gold rewards
items.description: Earn gold by reaching achievement milestones, which can be used to unlock more powerful weapons and enhance your gameplay.

howToPlay.title: How to Play Funny Shooter?
howToPlay.subTitle: Explore vibrant, colorful landscapes filled with unique enemies. This upgraded version of Funny Shooter offers smooth progression with a diverse range of weapons, enemies, levels, and achievements.

items.text: Your opponents include odd characters like redmen, toiletmen, and giants. Use various firearms, grenades, and explosives to take them down with high-impact attacks.

Funny Shooter 2 features excellent progression. You’ll encounter new enemies every few levels, and face a powerful boss every 10 levels. Along the way, you’ll unlock achievements, upgrades, and access to a shop filled with powerful weapons.
Visit the shop to purchase new weapons and customize your loadout. There are numerous options to create a unique arsenal that matches your playstyle.

Need more gold? Head to the achievements screen to claim rewards, which can be used to upgrade your gear or buy new weapons. You can also accelerate your progress by using RPG and grenade launcher upgrades from the home screen.

items.question: Is Funny Shooter only available on desktop?
items.answer: No, you can also enjoy this game on Android devices!

items.question: How many levels are in Funny Shooter 2?
items.answer: Funny Shooter 2 offers endless levels of gameplay.

items.question: Can I play Funny Shooter offline?
items.answer: No, an internet connection is required to play Funny Shooter.

items.question: Are there multiplayer features in Funny Shooter?
items.answer: Funny Shooter is a single-player game, but we plan to introduce multiplayer modes in future updates.

items.question: Can I reset my progress in Funny Shooter 2?
items.answer: Yes, you can reset your progress from the game settings if you'd like to start fresh.
